is.ru.tictactoe

Class TicTacToeGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.ru.tictactoe.TicTacToeGame

  • public class TicTacToeGame
extends java.lang.Object
    The TicTacToeGame class represents a data type for storing all information on a particular game of TicTacToeGame.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TicTacToeGame()
      Initializes the TicTacToeGame object with the default starting player 'X'.
      TicTacToeGame(char firstPlayer)
      Initializes the TicTacToeGame object with the firstPlayer

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean gameOver()
      Determines whether the TicTacToeGame is over or not

      Returns the character array representing the TicTacToeGame board

      Return the players who's turn it is in the TicTacToeGame.
      Move move(int position)
      Calls the constructor of Move to construct a Move with position and the player who's turn it is in the game

      Calls the constructor of Move to construct a Move with position and player.
      boolean move(Move move)
      Adds the Move as the next move of the TicTacToeGame
      void resetGame()
      Resets the TicTacToeGame
      char winner()
      Returns Winner of the TicTacToeGame or 'D' if the game was drawn.

        Returns:
